decision_conditions: The proposed variation to the description of the development of the planning permission reference number: 15/12936/FUL, as varied by 17/12982/FUL and 20/01710/FUL, to remove the existing reference to 82 car parking spaces does not result in a material variation to the consented development, and as such the S96A application for a non-material amendment is accepted.
description: Section 96A application for a Non Material Amendment  to  vary application ref 15/12936/FUL, as varied by 17/12982/FUL and 20/01710/FUL to amend the description of development, to read  Demolition of existing outbuildings, alterations and part demolition of main two storey building. Use of existing building and site as secondary school and erection of three storey rear extension to provide 6537sqm of additional floorspace for classrooms, etc. and sports hall accommodation for six forms of entry for seven year groups. Provision of Multi-Use Games Area to rear and enclosures to front and rear to provide outside space associated with the school. Provision of widened pedestrian/ cycle access route between Wolsey Drive and Richmond Road and alterations to the front car park to provide parking spaces and provision of cycle parking.
